labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The green dot doesn't show at all
data.expected_result: The green dot should show next to your name once you have switched
data.short_description: Green dot doesn't show if you immediately switch from PTT keybind to PTT Priortiy keybind
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Push to Talk - Set it to one key like G - Go to Keybinds - Assign Push To Talk Priority a different key like Mouse 3 - Go into a voice channel with friends - Hit your push to talk keybind and immediately switch to your Priorty keybind
